text: Koffee with Karan is an Indian talk show broadcast on Star World India. The first episode aired on 19 November 2004. The show is hosted by producer and director Karan Johar and is produced by SOL India. The show wrapped up its sixth season on 17 March 2019. ==Series overview== ==Season 1 (2004–05)== ==Season 2 (2007)== ==Season 3 (2010-11)== ==Season 4 (2013-14)== ==Season 5 (2016-17)== ==Season 6 (2018-19)== ==Footnotes== ==References== Category:Lists of variety television series episodes Category:Lists of Indian television series episodes Category:Star India
title: List of Koffee with Karan episodes
